review: The unit itself is nice. Setup is quick. Picture quality is good and onscreen menus are clear. However, this product has a serious drawback IF YOU ARE A COMCAST XFINITY CUSTOMER. Neither the ShowtimeAnytime app nor the soon-to-be-included HBOGo app allow Xfinity customers to authenticate to use the app on Fire TV.The fact is hidden on both the Amazon site and on the Showtime site. Both tout that you can watch ShowtimeAnytime, and that ShowtimeAnytime works on all major service providers. That's not entirely true. While Showtime and HBO apps work fine on mobile devices, on streaming media players like Roku and Fire TV, Comcast users cannot authenticate their subscriptions.Showtime and the news that HBO Go was on its way to Fire TV were the two main reasons I wanted Fire TV. However, without those, buying a wifi Blu-Ray player with on-board apps is actually a better route, so my Fire TV is headed back to Amazon for a full refund.
